'' Looking for a spark, 76ers coach Eddie Jordan benched power forward Elton Brand and paired rookie Jrue Holiday in the backcourt with Allen Iverson . Jordan's move worked: Jrue Holiday had 15 points, seven rebounds and six assists. He just put us in a good rhythm tonight and had us flowing, Allen Iverson said. Elton Brand , who was previously benched in some fourth quarters, said it was hard to complain about his role after a victory. The company states in a press release, When Michael Vick 's ribs were injured after being drilled by a pair of Washington Redskins, the Eagles equipment staff contacted Unequal to build a lightweight, comfortable, flexible vest that could withstand the force of a NFL style blitz. Unequal answered the call with its EXOskeleton â¢ technology that it originally developed for the military. Michael Vick used the Unequal Chest Protector in the November 7th game against the Indianapolis Colts to protect his ribs. After the game Michael Vick said the Unequal Pad made him feel invincible. `` I'm thrilled to be a part of the Unequal team. I have been wearing Unequal chest protectors, shoulder pads, and thigh pads for much of the late and post-season- resulting in pain-free

be planning to do will affect Rochester directly. Barack Obama Kirsten Gillibrand really hopes to hear that the research and development tax credit will be made permanent. She said that could bring many jobs here to Rochester. What that tax credit is about is it allows businesses that are innovators, entrepreneurial businesses like a lot of the businesses in Rochester to invest in research in development and get a credit for that investment. So really it makes a difference in creating jobs, particularly in growing industries like high tech, bio-tech, energy technology, optical technology all of that work that we do in Rochester would really benefit greatly from an R&D tax credit that's permanent.
